alert.note: Alert for Kent; Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 3:58PM EDT until June 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Windham County in northern Connecticut... West central Kent County in Rhode Island... Southwestern Providence County in Rhode Island... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Killingly, or 10 miles northeast of Plainfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Coventry, Plainfield, Killingly, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Brooklyn, West Greenwich, Foster, Pomfret and Sterling. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
